data.text: @SteveDaines @POTUS Hope you trade your portfolio based on "alternative facts" to the BS you spout here!  🤡
@SteveDaines @SenateGOP @POTUS Where????? My rents up, electricity is up 10% , can't afford beef or insurance??? What country do you live in????

@SteveDaines @POTUS Not true..

I dont see any money going to my saving account.  Barely scrapping by.   Living 2 paychecks behind and taking out credit cards every month to pay for things is not saving money.
$200 a week for food
$350 a month for electricity
$750 for heating oil
@SteveDaines @POTUS $400 a month on electricity on a small 1300 square home and paying over $700 every 6 weeks in heating oil and paying $150 a week for a family of 3 is not affordable!!

@SteveDaines @SenateGOP @POTUS Heating oil is close to $4.00 a gallon.  Im sorry that is an extra $700 plus every 6 weeks.  Someone making $19.00 and paying health insurance and daily necessary things leaves with zero to breadcrumbs.  Please.  Still not good enough!!
@SteveDaines @POTUS I wish someone would let me know when it happens.
